page.title: 02Summary
page.content: area this year. Among themany wild flowers which grow are the Bee Orchid and the Fyfield Pea (Lathyrus tuberosus ). There are no shops in this area. The only village shop at Willingale was closed in l984. There are three churches (two within the same churchyard). The village school in Willingale was closed in July l985. The character of the area has changed within the last twenty years as the number of farm workers has decreased owing to mechanisation. Farm labourers cottages have been sold to people who work out of the area. There are only a very few people who live and work within the area.
